title: No Favorite Team Set
custom_preconds:
Given a user is using Android At Bat
and logged in with a TV Premium account
and the user has NO favorite team set

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the MLB.tv button from the expanded Scoreboard game cell (bottom left corner)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the home team's MLB.TV feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the MLB.tv button from the Home Team Page's top score module (bottom left corner)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the home team's MLB.TV feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the MLB.tv button from the Away Team Page's top score module (bottom left corner)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the home team's MLB.TV feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user launches MLB.TV via a deep link for that game matchup
http://wapqa.mlb.com/test/android/atbat-links.html
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the home team's MLB.TV feed will launch

title: No Favorite Team Set
custom_preconds:
Given a user is using Android At Bat
and logged in with an At Bat Premium account
and the user has NO favorite team set

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the MLB.tv button from the expanded Scoreboard game cell of the MLB.TV Game of the Day (bottom left corner)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then he paywall appears with message stating: 
You are not an MLB.tv customer. Try signing in with another MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the MLB.tv button from the Home Team Page's top score module of the MLB.TV Game of the Day (bottom left corner)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then he paywall appears with message stating: 
You are not an MLB.tv customer. Try signing in with another MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the MLB.tv button from the Away Team Page's top score module of the MLB.TV Game of the Day (bottom left corner)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then he paywall appears with message stating: 
You are not an MLB.tv customer. Try signing in with another MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user launches MLB.TV via a deep link of the MLB.TV Game of the Day
http://wapqa.mlb.com/test/android/atbat-links.html
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then he paywall appears with message stating: 
You are not an MLB.tv customer. Try signing in with another MLB account

and the user will not see an access issue

custom_steps_separated.expected:

and the user will not see an access issue
